mapper.select: select pro_idx, pro_name, pro_writer, pro_price, pro_reg_date, pro_content, pro_category1, pro_category2, pro_category3, pro_modify_date from bec_product order by pro_idx ASC

select BP.pro_idx, BP.pro_name, BP.pro_writer, BP.pro_price, BP.pro_amount, BP.pro_content, BP.pro_image, BP.pro_company, BP.pro_video, BP.pro_category1, BP.pro_category2, BP.pro_category3, BP.pro_reg_date, BP.pro_modify_date, FLOOR(BP.pro_price-(BP.pro_price * (BP.pro_sale / 100))) AS pro_sale_price, ifNULL( FLOOR(AVG(BR.review_star)), 0)AS review_star_avg from bec_product BP INNER JOIN bec_review BR ON BP.pro_idx = BR.pro_idx where BP.pro_idx = #{pro_idx}

SELECT BP.pro_idx, BP.pro_name, BP.pro_writer, BP.pro_price, BP.pro_sale, BP.pro_amount, BP.pro_content, BP.pro_image, BP.pro_company, BP.pro_video, BP.pro_category1, BP.pro_category2, BP.pro_category3, BP.pro_reg_date, BP.pro_modify_date, FLOOR(BP.pro_price - BP.pro_price * (BP.pro_sale / 100)) AS pro_sale_price, ifnull(FLOOR(AVG(BR.review_star)),0) AS review_star_avg FROM bec_product BP INNER JOIN bec_review BR ON BP.pro_idx = BR.pro_idx GROUP BY BP.pro_idx ORDER BY BP.pro_reg_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT BP.pro_idx, BP.pro_name, BP.pro_writer, BP.pro_price, BP.pro_sale, BP.pro_content, BP.pro_image, BP.pro_reg_date, FLOOR(BP.pro_price - BP.pro_price * (BP.pro_sale / 100)) AS pro_sale_price, ifnull(FLOOR(AVG(BR.review_star)),0) AS review_star_avg, COALESCE(orders.order_count, 0) AS order_count FROM bec_product BP LEFT JOIN bec_review BR ON BP.pro_idx = BR.pro_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pro_idx, sum(pro_quantity) AS order_count FROM bec_order_detail GROUP BY pro_idx ) AS orders ON BP.pro_idx = orders.pro_idx GROUP BY BP.pro_idx ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT 10;
